x x x x+x x x x x x x x x lu x+x x x x x x i-su-ri LUGAL be-li₂ i-qab-bi ma-a GUD-MEŠ UDU-MEŠ ša man-ni šu₂-nu ša ma-da-ti šu₂-nu 02-šu₂ 03-šu₂ i-sap-ra ma-a lil-li-ku-u-ni lu-u-še-ti-qu a-na-ku a-sap-ra-šu₂ nu-uk ha-na-ka le-ku-lu u₂-la ma-a a-du be-li₂ ina {URU}A-MEŠ-dur-na-ni lil-li-ku-ni lu-u-še-ti-qu a-na-ku {LU₂}ERIM-MEŠ x TA an-na-ka a-sap-ra nu-uk lu-še-ti-qu-u-ni kaq-qu-ru 01 KASKAL.GID₂ TA {URU}de-ri it-tal-ku-u-ni i-sap-ra u₂-sa-hi-ir-šu₂-nu ma-a {LU₂}KUR₂ ina UGU-hi-šu₂-nu i-za-qu-up {LU₂}ERIM-MEŠ it-tal-ku UD-MEŠ 05 ina {URU}de-ri kam-mu-su a-du ŠA₃-šu₂ iq-ba-aš₂-šu₂-u-ni u₂-se-ti-qa-aš₂-šu₂-nu dib-bi-šu₂ gab-bu am-mar ina ŠA₃ e-gir₂-te-šu₂ iš-pur-an-ni ina ŠU.2 {LU₂}GAL-kal-la-bi {LU₂}GAL-kal-la-bi an-ni-i x x+x ša ina ŠA₃-bi il-lik-u-ni ina UGU {1}ba-la-su {LU₂}A.BA ša LUGAL EN-a x x x x x x x x x x x ina IGI {LU₂}GAL-kal-la-bi {LU₂}GAL-kal-la-bi ša a-na LUGAL be-li₂-ia aš₂-pur-an-ni x x x x-ri a-šap-par-šu x x ina pa-ni-šu₂ it-ta-at-lak ina {URU}HAL.ṢU e-ta-rab {1}{d}UTU-EN-PAB ki-ma e-ta-mar-šu₂ it-ta-na-ah-na-qa x x x x-ni ma-a a-na mi-i-ni x x x i-se-e-a ina {URU}HAL.ṢU x x ma-a a-na-ku la al-ʾe-e x x x x ma-a a-ki {1}{d}AMAR.UTU-šal-lim x x x x il-la-ku-u-ni x x x x+x ma-a {LU₂}ERIM-MEŠ lu-rad-du-u-ni x x x x-ši e-mur-u-ni x x x x+x-iš pi-te {URU}HAL.ṢU x x x x x-šab-šu₂ E₂ UD-MEŠ x x x x x+x ma lu-u iš-pu-ra x x x x ina ŠA₃-bi il-la-ku-u-ni x x it-ta-na-ah-na-qa x x x x x x x x x
